analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ContributorApprover.eligibleTestAndIncrement (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#430-455):
	External calls:
	- result = eligible(contributor,amountInWei) (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#433)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participated (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#435-439)
	- remainingPresaleCap (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#444-447)
	- remainingPublicSaleCap (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#453-454)

CryptoGripInitiative.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#300-307) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#307)

CryptoGripTokenSale.CryptoGripTokenSale (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#490-517) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(gripWallet,_premintedTokenSupply * 10 ** 18) (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#515-517)

CryptoGripTokenSale.finalizeSale (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#573-581) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.burn(token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#577-580)

Reentrancy in CryptoGripTokenSale.buy (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#527-565):
	External calls:
	- weiPayment = eligibleTestAndIncrement(recipient,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#533-536)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value.sub(weiPayment)) (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#542-545)
	- sendETHToMultiSig(weiPayment) (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#548)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- raisedWei (/unique_chucks/47/0x11fc3e9730c8413f66007d66fbabc5eee1955dcc.sol#549-552)
